Work

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

This is a web app where you can check the weather in just about any city in the world. Just put in the name of the city you want to look up and the app will handle the rest.

View Project on Github

Music Find

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

This was a neat little thing I made in an attempt to be a one stop shop for when you stumble on to THAT band. You know, the one that comes on the radio that one time and you can't get their song out of your head and you think "what else do they have? Maybe they're good live?" Just type in their name and Music Find will get you all the relavent information you need about them.

View Project on Github

Password Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

My first dive into javascript. This neat little app helps you create a random password to satisfy YOUR needs. Just answer a few questions about what you want from a password and it'll do the rest.

View Project on Github

Built With: HTML, CSS

This was my first real dive into HTML and CSS. I thought things were intimidating then... jeez.
